tool_description: Unofficial API to gather video information from the trending section of Youtube
name: Youtube Trending
title: Youtube Trending

api_list.name: trending

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
enum for video type:
- default
- music
- gaming
- movies

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Country code to retrieve trending videos for the provided country.
E.g, US, DE, JP etc.
